plugin_info.plugin_description: Import a network saved in an Excel book into Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by K Mohamed (khaled.mohamed@manchester.ac.uk) (c) Copyright 2015, The University of Manchester For more information visit Hydra website

arg.name: template
arg.help: XML file defining the types for the network.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config

arg.name: project
arg.help: The Id of the project, if is not provided a new project will be created

arg.name: scenario
arg.help: Specify the name of the scenario created by the import function. Every import creates a new scenario. If no name is provided a default name will be assigned.

arg.name: network
arg.help: The ID of the network which will be updated. If not provided, a new network will becreated
